result.eng: He would usually go out on Friday night.
result.ga: Ba ghnách leis dul amach oíche Aoine
result.orig: Ba ghnách leis dul amach oíche Aoine
result.html: Ba ghnách leis dul amach oíche AoineHe would usually go out on Friday night.
result.ponchtml: Ba ġnáċ leis dul amaċ oíċe AoineHe would usually go out on Friday night.

result.eng: I usually work late at night.
result.ga: Bím ag obair déanach san oíche
result.orig: Bím ag obair déanach san oíche
result.html: Bím ag obair déanach san oícheI usually work late at night.
result.ponchtml: Bím ag obair déanaċ san oíċeI usually work late at night.

result.eng: Copyright is usually held by whoever created the work.
result.ga: Bíonn an cóipcheart leis an té a chum
result.orig: Bíonn an cóipcheart leis an té a chum
result.html: Bíonn an cóipcheart leis an té a chumCopyright is usually held by whoever created the work.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn an cóipċeart leis an té a ċumCopyright is usually held by whoever created the work.

result.eng: The Irish are usually very friendly.
result.ga: Bíonn na hÉireannaigh an-chairdiúil de ghnáth
result.orig: Bíonn na hÉireannaigh an-chairdiúil de ghnáth
result.html: Bíonn na hÉireannaigh an-chairdiúil de ghnáthThe Irish are usually very friendly.

result.eng: Where do you usually go shopping?
result.ga: Cá mbíonn sibh ag siopadóireacht
result.orig: Cá mbíonn sibh ag siopadóireacht
result.html: Cá mbíonn sibh ag siopadóireachtWhere do you usually go shopping?

result.eng: She prepared breakfast as she usually did.
result.ga: D'ullmhaigh sí bricfeasta mar ba ghnáth léi
result.orig: D'ullmhaigh sí bricfeasta mar ba ghnáth léi
result.html: D'ullmhaigh sí bricfeasta mar ba ghnáth léiShe prepared breakfast as she usually did.
result.ponchtml: D'ullṁaiġ sí bricfeasta mar ba ġnáṫ léiShe prepared breakfast as she usually did.

result.eng: From this day on the weather usually worsens.
result.ga: Is ag dul i ndonacht a bhíonn an aimsir ón lá seo amach
result.orig: Is ag dul i ndonacht a bhíonn an aimsir ón lá seo amach
result.html: Is ag dul i ndonacht a bhíonn an aimsir ón lá seo amachFrom this day on the weather usually worsens.
result.ponchtml: Is ag dul i ndonaċt a ḃíonn an aimsir ón lá seo amaċFrom this day on the weather usually worsens.

result.eng: I usually listen very hard at these lectures.
result.ga: Is gnách dom éisteacht go géar ag na léachtaí seo
result.orig: Is gnách dom éisteacht go géar ag na léachtaí seo
result.html: Is gnách dom éisteacht go géar ag na léachtaí seoI usually listen very hard at these lectures.

result.eng: Immigrants usually don't speak good English.
result.ga: Ní gnách Béarla maith a bheith ag inimircigh
result.orig: Ní gnách Béarla maith a bheith ag inimircigh
result.html: Ní gnách Béarla maith a bheith ag inimircighImmigrants usually don't speak good English.
result.ponchtml: Ní gnáċ Béarla maiṫ a ḃeiṫ ag inimirciġImmigrants usually don't speak good English.

result.eng: News is [usually] available at seven o'clock on TG4 also.
result.ga: Bíonn nuacht le fáil ag a seacht a chlog ar TG4 freisin
result.orig: Bíonn nuacht le fáil ag a seacht a chlog ar TG4 freisin

result.ponchtml: Bíonn nuaċt le fáil ag a seaċt a ċlog ar TG4 freisinNews is [usually] available at seven o'clock on TG4 also.

result.eng: I [usually] knit on Saturdays.
result.ga: Bím ag cniotáil ar an Satharn
result.orig: Bím ag cniotáil ar an Satharn
result.html: Bím ag cniotáil ar an SatharnI [usually] knit on Saturdays.
result.ponchtml: Bím ag cniotáil ar an SaṫarnI [usually] knit on Saturdays.

result.eng: I usually wake at six o'clock.
result.ga: Éirím ag a sé a chlog de ghnáth
result.orig: Éirím ag a sé a chlog de ghnáth
result.html: Éirím ag a sé a chlog de ghnáthI usually wake at six o'clock.
result.ponchtml: Éirím ag a sé a ċlog de ġnáṫI usually wake at six o'clock.

result.eng: We are [usually] in the library and the lab most of the time.
result.ga: Bíonn muid sa leabharlann agus sa saotharlann an chuid is mó den am

result.eng: My classes are [usually] at four o'clock each afternoon.
result.ga: Bíonn mo chuid ranganna ar siúl ag a ceathair a chlog chuile thráthnóna
result.orig: Bíonn mo chuid ranganna ar siúl ag a ceathair a chlog chuile thráthnóna

result.eng: You are [usually] very busy!
result.ga: Bíonn tú an-graitheach

result.eng: What are the hours that you are [usually] working?

result.eng: I [usually] work from nine o'clock to five.
result.ga: Bím ag obair óna naoi a chlog go dtí a cúig

result.eng: Where do you [usually] play your music?

result.eng: We [usually] play in the pubs in Woodlawn and in Manhattan, New York.
result.ga: Bíonn muid ag casadh sna tithe tábhairne i Woodlawn agus i Manhattan Nua-Eabhrac

result.eng: Don't forget the newspaper that we usually have each day.

result.eng: I usually go for long walks at the weekend; I love being out in the open air.
